text_logic_form: Point $M$ is the midpoint of the leg of trapezoid $TRSV$.
Point $N$ is the midpoint of the other leg of trapezoid $TRSV$.
The length of the line $VS$ is $21$ units.
The length of the line $TR$ is $44$ units.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Point $M$ is the midpoint of the leg of trapezoid $TRSV$.
Point $N$ is the midpoint of the other leg of trapezoid $TRSV$.
The length of the line $VS$ is $21$ units.
The length of the line $TR$ is $44$ units.
diagram_logic_form: Point $N$ lies on the line connecting $R$ and $A$.
Point $M$ lies on the line connecting $T$ and $V$.
line_instances: There are lines $AN$, $AV$, $NM$, $RA$, $RN$, $RT$, $TM$, $TV$, and $VM$ forming the trapezoid and its diagonals.
